info.title: Student Achievement API

post.description: Student uploads a new achievement with file proof

post.description: Masuk sistem untuk mendapatkan Token JWT

role_id.description: Ubah int menjadi string agar kompatibel dengan UUID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
